nodes.text: The Maintenance Droid M2-T2 was a model of maintenance droid that were used in the Research and Development sector of the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War.

The Maintenance Droid M2-T2 is a type of friendly droid in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Research and Development area of the Okara Droid Factory, a Heroic area, on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
